h: Newly wed man dies in accident

sub_h: A massive fire broke out following a collision between two trucks near Shiggaon in the Haveri district of Karnataka on Monday morning.

h: Last year, 76% of Road accidents in Bengaluru occurred on straight stretches
sub_h: Most motor vehicle accidents in Bengaluru city in 2022 happened on straight roads and main roads and not at curves or on roads full of humps. Incidentally, the year also saw a dip in the number of accidents caused by poor infrastructure.

h: Mysuru police take steps to prevent Road accidents
sub_h: After the death of eleven members of a Ballari family in a ghastly Road accident near T Narasipura recently, the district police have asked the National Highways Authority of India and road transport authorities to take up measures to prevent s. Cops have recommended the widening of roads, especially near curves.

h: Data: Most fatal accident accused did secondary edu
Karnataka accident: 5 killed, 13 injured as cruiser rams into lorry in Yadgir
sub_h: As many as five people were killed and 13 others injured when a cruiser rammed into a lorry stationed at roadside in Yadgir district of Karnataka on Tuesday.

h: T Narasipura accident eye-opener about flouted rules
Pilgrimage turns tragic: Ten die in head-on collision between car, bus near Mysuru
sub_h: Ten persons including nine of a family from Ballari died in a ghastly Road accident after the hired SUV in which the family was travelling crashed into the oncoming private bus, on a state road near T Narasipura, some 36 km away from Mysuru city on Monday.

h: Two killed in Road accidents
11 killed in two Road accidents in Karnataka
4 killed in Road accident near Kadaba in DK
Two killed in Road accident in Mangaluru
sub_h: City police commissioner Kuldeep Kumar R Jain said the accident took place after a tipper truck rammed the two-wheeler around 12.15pm. The deceased are Samuel Jesudas, 66, a resident of Sulthan Bathery and his relative Bhoomika, 17.

h: Two workers die in road mishap
6 pilgrims killed in Road accident in Karnataka's Chinchanur
sub_h: Six pilgrims, including three women, were killed while and a few others suffered injuries when the vehicle in which they were travelling crashed into a tree in Chinchanur on Thursday.

h: Biker dies in Road accident
sub_h: A man died after being hit by a bus and another man was injured. The man who died was from Mogarahalli Manti Village in Srirangapatna Taluk and the man who was injured is from Manti Village in the same Taluk. The accident happened on Monday evening and the man who died was 25 years old. The man who was injured is 24 years old and he is currently in the hospital.

h: Man, 59, ends life in Karnataka's Yadagiri a day after son’s death in road mishap
sub_h: A 52-year-old man died by suicide by jumping into an open well at Madraki of Shahapur taluk in Yadagiri district a day after his son died in a Road accident.

h: PM Narendra Modi’s brother Prahlad Modi, family injured in car crash near Mysuru
sub_h: Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s brother Prahlad Modi and his family members were injured in a Road accident on National Highway 766 near Mysuru on Tuesday.

h: 2 killed as truck hits car on Bengaluru-Mysuru Expressway
sub_h: Two persons have died, and another three persons seriously injured in a Road accident on Bengaluru-Mysuru Expressway at Gejjalagere in Maddur taluk in the wee hours of Monday.

h: ‘Bus conductor not a skilled worker’: Karnataka HC cuts accident-death relief
sub_h: A bus conductor isn’t a skilled professional that one can argue about his prospects for gainful employment even after retirement, the Kalaburagi bench of the Karnataka high court said while reducing the compensation given to the family of a Maharashtra State Road Transport Corporation employee who died in a .

h: Two students killed in Road accident in Karnataka
sub_h: Sources said the accident took place when they were returning after attending classes at a evening college.

h: Road accident leads to clash; 2 cases registered in Mangaluru
sub_h: Two cases were registered at the Surathkal police station on Wednesday, after an accident took place between a two-wheeler and a car, that led to a scuffle between two groups near Ganeshpura Circle.

h: Yelahanka sees highest fatal Road accidents in Bengaluru
sub_h: Fatalities due to Road accidents continue to be the highest in Yelahanka. While 52 road fatalities were reported in the police station limits in 2021, the number stood at 40 in the first 10 months of this year.

h: Man killed, 2 injured in Road accident
sub_h: In an accident on Saturday, one person died and two others were injured. The deceased is Abdul Razak. The injured are a driver of a goods vehicle and a passenger of a school bus. A case has been filed at the Belthangady Traffic Police Station. Stalls for the Hindu Jagarana Vedike's annual festival are being auctioned, and they asked that non-Hindus not participate. The festival is scheduled to be held in the first week of January.

h: Youth dies in Road accident on Mysuru-Bengaluru highway
sub_h: A person died while another was seriously injured in an accident on the Mysurubiengaluru highway near Nidaghatta village in Maddur taluk on Saturday evening.

h: Cop, wife die in Kalaburagi Road accident
sub_h: A Sindagi police circle inspector and his wife died instantly when their car rammed a multi-wheel container parked by the roadside in Kalaburagi district early Wednesday.The deceased have been identified as Ravi Ukkunda, 43, and wife Madhu, 40.

h: 6 pilgrims killed, 16 injured after goods vehicle rams into tree in Karnataka's Belagavi
sub_h: Six pilgrims, including two children, were killed after the goods vehicle they were travelling in rammed into a roadside tree near Chinchanur village in Ramdurg taluk in the wee hours of Thursday.

h: Annually 4.5 lakh die in Road accident, but little attention given to it: Bengaluru traffic police chief
Karnataka: Two die in Road accident
sub_h: Two persons died on the spot when a motorbike collided with a speeding truck on Saturday night near Halagatti village in Ramdurg taluk. The deceased were identifed as Arjun Thimmanna Bandivaddar (40) of Hanamapur village, and Suvarna Basappa Holennavar (28) of Obalapur village.

h: Two die in Road accident
sub_h: Two masons on their way back home from Mysuru were killed in a ghastly Road accident near Nanjangud on Sunday. Mahadevappa (44) and Mahesh (43), both residents of Hegottara in Chamarajanagar district, died on the spot, Nanjangud traffic police confirmed.

h: 3 of family killed in accident in Mangaluru
sub_h: Three of a family died in an accident between a car and a private bus at Nellikaru inin Mangaluru at around 7.15 am on Saturday.

h: Three agri workers from AP killed in accident
sub_h: Three labourers were killed in a Road accident at Maski here late on Monday night. According to Maski police, the deceased are Nagaraj, 31, Srinivas, 26, and Jaypal, 19. They died on the spot when their bike rammed into a bus.

h: 12 JD(S) supporters injured in two Road accidents in Mandya
sub_h: A total of 12 people were injured in two separate Road accidents near mudalakoppalu village of Nagamangala taluk of Mandya district late on Monday. An accident occurred between the goods auto and the car while several people were returning to their village in a goods auto after participating in the pancharathna yatra’ event organised by JDS in Nagamangala town on Monday. The vehicle overturned and 11 people in the auto were injured. In another accident a bike and an auto collided on the same road where the bike rider was seriously injured. All 11 people injured are from Garudapur village and the bike rider, Anand from Thuppadamadu village is a JDS party worker. Those injured in the accident were immediately admitted to BGS hospital in Bg Nagar and treated one of the injured persons is said to be in critical condition and is in the ICU. Another victims wounds were operated on. On hearing the news, former CM HD Kumaraswamy along with MLA Suresh Gowda visited BGS hospital on Tuesday and enquired about the health of the injured speaking to reporters Kumaraswamy said all the injured were recovering. Meanwhile, he said the sevenday tour of the

h: Karnataka: Belagavi tops in Road accident deaths among districts in 2021-2022
sub_h: With 816 fatalities, Road accidents in Belagavi district claimed the maximum lives in the state during 2021-2022. It is followed by Bengaluru city (633), Tumakuru (596), Mysuru (510) and Bengaluru district (507).

h: Karnataka: Three of family killed, four injured in Vijayapura Road accident
sub_h: Three members of a family, including a newborn and his mother, were killed in a Road accident at Kolhar Taluk of the Vijayapura district in Karnataka, police said on Thursday.

h: Karnataka: 5 killed, 4 injured in Road accident in Koppal
sub_h: At least five persons were killed on the spot and four others sustained injuries after the SUV they were travelling in collided with an unknown vehicle at Bhanapur in Karnataka's Koppal district on Saturday midnight.

h: PM Narendra Modi's brother Prahlad Modi, kin injured in Road accident near Mysuru
sub_h: Family members of Prahlad Modi, brother of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, escaped with minor injuries after the luxury SUV they were travelling in crashed into a road median on National Highway-766 at Kadakola, near Mysuru, on Tuesday afternoon.

h: Four from TN returning after New Year party in Goa die in Road accident in Karnataka
sub_h: According to police, the accident occurred at Baleguli village in Ankola taluk of Karwar district on National Highway 66.

h: Karnataka: 4 cops, 3 others booked for faking details of fatal Road accident case
sub_h: Channapatna police have registered a case of criminal conspiracy, destruction of evidence and cheating against four cops for allegedly tampering with the investigation in a motor vehicle accident case to enable the family of a dead man to avail insurance benefits.

h: Two die in road crash in Hubballi
sub_h: Two persons who were on their way to bring the body of their acquaintance from KIMS Hospital in Hubballi died in a road crash at Ramanal cross in Kalghatgi taluk on Monday.Their Cruiser collided with a bus.

h: French nationals injured in Road accident
1 killed, 3 injured in Road accident
7 killed, 13 injured in Road accident in Karnataka's Dharwad
sub_h: At least seven people were killed and 13 others sustained serious injuries when their cab rammed into a tree in Karnataka's Dharwad early on Saturday.

h: Road accidents kill 3 in three hours
sub_h: Two senior citizens and a youth died in separate Road accidents in a span of three hours on Wednesday . The first accident was reported on Bannerghatta Road at 8.30pm, when a rashly driven auto rammed into Sandegappa, 69.

h: 2 students killed in accident
Karnataka: 4 students killed, 2 injured in Road accident
sub_h: Four college students, including a girl, were killed and two others critically injured in a Road accident on National Highway 75 in Bengaluru Rural district of Karnataka on Wednesday.

h: Road accidents surge, Begur turns nightmare for travellers
sub_h: Begur near Gundlupet in Chamarajanagar, which connects Ooty in Tamil Nadu and Wayanad in Kerala to Karnataka has become a death trap.

h: Auto driver dies in Mysuru Road crash
sub_h: A 43-year-old autorickshaw driver succumbed to injuries he'd sustained in a serial accident near Satellite bus stand on Mysuru Road early Monday.

h: Karnataka: Chicken shop owner killed in car-bike collision on Magadi Road
sub_h: A car, moving on the extreme right at a curve, collided with a bike on Magadi Road near Chikkarasikatte village on Saturday. Chandrashekhar R, 41, who was riding the bike, died instantly.

h: Karnataka: Six killed in Mysuru Road accident
sub_h: According to police sources, all six men travelling in the jeep have died on the spot. They were returning to their native place Polibetta in Kodagu after attending a marriage ceremony when the tragedy happened around 5 pm. The driver too has died on the spot.

h: Youth, bizman killed in Road accidents
sub_h: Two persons, including a 27-year-old private firm employee, were killed in Road accidents in the city. The first accident occurred around 9.

h: Organs harvested from Road accident victims
sub_h: Families of two Road accident victims including a 66-year-old retired police officer who was wheeled into Apollo Hospital in critical condition, have donated the organs of their beloved ones after learning their survival was not possible because of their medical conditions.

h: 2 motorists crash into road hump, divider; die
sub_h: Two persons, including a civil engineer, died in two accidents in the city. One did not notice a road hump and lost control of his vehicle and the other crashed into a divider.

h: 651 died in Road accidents in Bengaluru last year
sub_h: A total of 651 persons were killed in Road accidents in Bengaluru during 2021, shows a study undertaken by traffic police.Two-wheeler riders accounted for most of the victims — while 328 were riders, 76 were pillion riders. The deceased also included 161 pedestrians.

h: 8 killed, 25 injured in Road accident in Karnataka's Tumakuru district
sub_h: At least eight people were killed while more than 25 sustained injuries after a private bus they were traveling in toppled near Pavagada in Karnataka's Tumakuru district on Saturday morning.

h: Six die in Road accident in Karnataka
Parents donate eyes of teen killed in Road accident in Bengaluru
sub_h: Abhishek R, 19, died after his bike collided with a mini goods vehicle at Budihal Cross, near Nelamangala, on Tumakuru Road on Wednesday. His parents Ramesh K and Bhagyamma from Kuluvanahalli donated his eyes.

h: Karnataka: Three killed in Road accident
sub_h: According to the police, two mechanics and a driver had travelled from Bengaluru for the repair of a 12-wheel truck that was stranded for the past three days after a breakdown. As they were engaged in the repair of the truck at its rear, they were hit by a goods transport vehicle.

h: Four killed in Road accident in Karnataka's Udupi district
sub_h: Preliminary reports suggest that the incident was reported at the fifth curve (from the Someshwara side) of Agumbe Ghat. The deceased are learnt to be residents of Karkala.

h: Karnataka: 5 of a family killed in autorickshaw-tipper collision in Mandya
sub_h: Police said the accident occurred near Nelamakanahalli Gate and identified the deceased as Muttamma, 45, president of Bandura gram panchayat; daughter Basammanni, 30; son Venkatesh, 25; and Basammanni’s children Chamundeshwari, 8, and a two-year-old son.

h: Karnataka: 15-year-old dies in Road accident
sub_h: A 15-year-old boy died after an LPG tanker hit the scooter he was riding pillion near a chicken stall in Uppinangady of Puttur traffic police limits on Monday. Police said the deceased has been identified as Adhwith.

h: 14% dip in Road accident deaths in 2020 compared to 2019: NCRB
sub_h: There was a 14% dip in the number of deaths due to Road accidents across the country in 2020 compared to 2019, a comparison of data for the two years data from National Crime Record Bureau (NCRB).

h: 3 Tamil Nadu residents die in road mishap in Karnataka's Chamarajanagar
sub_h: Three people from Tamil Nadu were killed and several others sustained injuries after the tempo vehicle they were travelling in veered onto the wrong side of the road and fell into a gorge in Karnataka's Chamarajanagar early on Friday.

h: Fatal Road accidents: E-trials see drop in case pendency in Karnataka
sub_h: Pendency of fatal Road accidents cases in trial courts has fallen across the state, Karnataka police records show.

h: Actor Sanchari Vijay critical after Road accident in Bengaluru
sub_h: National awardwinning Kannada film actor Sanchari Vijay, 38, sustained severe injuries after his bike skidded at L&T South City, JP Nagar 7th Phase late Saturday night. His friend Naveen, 42, also sustained injuries. The bike hit an electric pole before coming to a halt.

h: Karnataka: 13 killed, 7 injured in head-on collision between tempo traveler, tipper near Dharwad
sub_h: Thirteen people were killed and seven others were injured after the tempo traveler in which they were travelling collided head-on with a tipper near Itigatti cross on Pune-Bengaluru National Highway bypass, three kilometers from Dharwad around 7.30am on Friday morning.

h: Karnataka: Four killed in Road accident in Hassan
Mangaluru: ASI injured in Road accident in 2018 dies
60 donate blood to mark accident victim’s 1st death anniversary
sub_h: Over 60 people, including family, relatives and community members, came together to mark the first death anniversary of a loved one, who was killed in a Road accident last year at Yelahanka.

h: Karnataka: Pregnant woman, six others killed in Road accident near Kalaburagi
sub_h: A 25-year-old pregnant woman and her six family members died when their MUV rammed a parked truck at Savalagi village on Aland road on the outskirts of Kalaburagi city early Sunday morning

h: Road accidents: Data reveals Sundays are the deadliest for motorists
sub_h: The accident stats throw up many surprises, one of which is that a majority of the accidents took place on straight roads (302 fatal and 126 self-accidents), while 40 took place at junctions of four roads, 53 at turns, 18 at speed-breakers and 29 at T-junctions.

h: Three killed in Karnataka bus mishap
sub_h: Three people were killed, while nearly 30 others were injured in a bus mishap near Sira in this district, police said on Friday. The incident happened on Thursday evening when the bus ferrying nearly50 people overturned near a curve near Mekerahalli, they said.

h: Excise sub-inspector, three techies die in crash on Hassan national highway
sub_h: An excise sub-inspector and three IT employees were killed as their car rammed a container truck on NH-75 near Channarayapatna in the early hours of Saturday. The four friends were on their way to attend a marriage in Chikkamagaluru. Such was the impact of the crash that the left side of the car was crushed and flattened into a mass.

h: Bengaluru: Four die after car crashes into truck
sub_h: Four persons, including a woman, died when their car crashed into cement-mixer truck at Bellalli village on Kannur Main Road near Vidyaranyapura, northwest Bengaluru, on Sunday noon.

h: SC panel seeks report on Dharwad accident
sub_h: The Supreme Court’s committee on road safety has taken note of a recent accident involving a minibus and a tipper on a bypass road at Itigatti, near Dharwad. It has issued a notice to the Karnataka transport department and sought a report on the incident, which claimed 11 lives. The report must list steps to prevent such collisions and statistics of mishaps and fatalities recorded on the 32-km road in the past two years.

h: Mangaluru: Teenager dies in Road accident
sub_h: A teenager was killed after the two-wheeler he was riding collided with a goods autorickshaw near Manjanady around 2.15 pm on Tuesday.

h: Five women from Karnataka killed in accident in Tamil Nadu
sub_h: Five women from Karnataka died in a Road accident after a tractor, in which they were travelling, toppled over. The accident took place near Anchetty in Tamil Nadu’s Krishnagiri district around 3pm on Monday.

h: Three of a family killed in accident in Mysuru
sub_h: Three of a family including a six-year-old girl died on spot after a four-wheeler rammed into a bike in which the family members were travelling on Mysuru-Bangaluru highway near Subhashnagar late on Thursday.

h: 10 accident-prone sections identified along Karnataka’s national highways
sub_h: There are 10 accident-prone sections on national highways in Karnataka, says the Union ministry of road transport and highways (MoRTH). Two of them are located along Hosur Road in Bengaluru.

h: Mysuru: Two cops on night patrol die in accident
sub_h: Two policemen on night patrol died in a Road accident in KR Nagar during the early hours of Thursday.

h: One killed, 4 injured in accident
Bengaluru: BE student dies in Road accident
sub_h: A 21-year-old student was killed and his classmate sustained injuries after a school bus hit their bike near Yelahanka on Monday morning. They were on their way to college.

h: Birthday boy abducted and killed; lover’s husband, cousin on the run
sub_h: A 20-year-old goods auto driver celebrating his birthday with his lover at a village off Tumakuru Road, was abducted by her husband and his cousin and beaten to death.

h: Karnataka: Four including seer killed in Road accident
sub_h: The NH-4 bypass between Narendra Cross and Gabbur Cross proved to be a death trap yet again on Sunday as four person died and three others sustained injuries after two cars collided head on.

h: Karnataka: Villagers perform 2-day homa to prevent accidents
sub_h: Marathon homas and pujas are usually performed by politicians to ensure victory in their endeavours. But residents of a nondescript village in Tumakuru district, Keregalapalya, did a 48-hour homa for a different reason — to prevent s.

h: DK police identify 123 spots prone to Road accidents
In DK, six people die in a week due to Road accidents
sub_h: The roads of Dakshina Kannada witness six deaths every week due to Road accidents. Interestingly, Mangaluru is the worst among tier-2 cities in Karnataka when it comes to rash and negligent driving leading to deaths.

h: Bengaluru: Most accidents on outskirts; road fatalities up 12% in 2019
sub_h: Fatalities due to Road accidents continue to rise in Bengaluru, with 2019 registering a sharper spike compared to the previous year.

h: Four bikers killed in Road accidents across Bengaluru
sub_h: Four people were killed and one injured in accidents in various parts of Bengaluru since Saturday night.

h: Bengaluru: Meat seller dies in Road accident
sub_h: A 22-year-old pork seller was killed after a sports bike he was riding was hit by a speeding truck from behind at Bandapura Gate near Hosakote on Thursday.

h: Karnataka: Teacher dies in accident
100% spurt in Road accidents makes Bengaluru slip nine positions in 2018
sub_h: Blame it on poor road infrastructure, negligent driving or lax enforcement of rules, the number of accidents in Bengaluru witnessed a 100% jump in 2018. It’s now ranked third in the list of cities whose population exceeds 1 crore, much worse than the 12th position it occupied the previous year.

h: Karnataka saw 2.2 lakh Road accidents, 54,000 deaths in 5 years
sub_h: In the past five years, around 2.2 lakh Road accidents were reported in Karnataka, which occupies the fourth spot in the state-wise rankings for 2018 as per the latest data released by the ministry of road transport and highways (MORTH). Over 54,000 people were killed in accidents during the same period.

h: Mysureans demand BBMP-like scheme for Road accident victims
College student killed in Road accident in Mangaluru
sub_h: A final year degree student died after his bike collided with a KSRTC bus on Uppinangady-Subrahmanya road on Thursday.
